prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a sleek, slender alien overlord, white polished organic bio-armor, crystalline purple gems, intense red eyes, visible slender tail
feature_prompt: hyperrealistic polished surface texture on organic armor, high-gloss reflections, volumetric rim lighting, sharp focus on the crystalline details, smooth organic texture on purple parts
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, dull surface, matte skin, fleshy texture, human proportions, bulky, flat lighting, low quality
